content.title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana
content.department: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
content.details: The Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana aims to provide affordable housing to the urban poor by providing financial assistance for the construction of houses.
eligibility: Must be a citizen of India
Must belong to the Economically Weaker Section (EWS) or Low Income Group (LIG)
Must not own a pucca house
exclusions: Individuals who already own a house

faqs.question: Who can apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Any citizen of India belonging to the EWS or LIG can apply.

faqs.question: What is the interest subsidy offered?
faqs.answer: The scheme offers an interest subsidy of up to 6.5% on home loans.
